original_title: Recess Monkey: Lighter Than Air Live at Teatro ZinZanni
overview: Join Recess Monkey and special friends on the HOT AIR balloon odyssey of a lifetime! Will Professor Loco, Shmee and Matey find the missing ingredient for the universe's greatest bubble? Will Tippi Tap help them find their way to the Nicobar Islands? Will Matey's family unlock the secrets of the magic plant!? "Lighter Than Air" is a co-production of Recess Monkey and Teatro ZinZanni Seattle, the latest installment of the Big Top Rock series under ZinZanni's famed 100+ year old speigeltent!
title: Recess Monkey: Lighter Than Air Live at Teatro ZinZanni
